messages.subject: always learning/unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/02 1:22:50 PM Central Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/29/02 1:22:50 PM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Personally, I feel freer here than at the other list. I ask more questions
here and answer more questions there. You all feel more like friends and I
have definitely NOT gotten to that place over there yet. >>

I totally agree.
I liken this list to hanging out with my unschooling friends at the park.
I can let my guard down, just hang loooooooose. YK?
Everyone here already "gets it" and being on the same page in the book is
really, really nice. Both lists have their purpose of course.
The unschooling.com list has gotten a lot more productive and helpful lately,
for the aforementioned reasons.
Ren
